subject: Baseball
Heart
lead_paragraph: Aaron Boone, who propelled the Yankees to the World Series in 2003, said his career might be over after learning he needs surgery to fix a problem with his aorta and aortic valve.
snippet: Aaron Boone, who propelled the Yankees to the World Series in 2003, said his career might be over after learning he needs surgery to fix a problem with his aorta and aortic valve.
